dialogue: Spirit begins flying towards Planet Molotov.
Hmm...this shouldn't be too long of a trip.
I think I can make it and be back by tomorrow.
But suddenly, space bullets whizz past Spirit's ship.
A fleet of fighter crafts were flanking her.
Spirit avoids the bullet fire as best as possible,
but she can't dodge them all.
Bullets rip holes into her ship and damage it
so severely that Spirit loses control of it completely.
With no say left, she begins falling towards the nearest planet.
